text:
I am a regular customer of RENDEZVOUS  Pub ever since it's officially opened. It's a friendly management with good services and entertainment. It's first location was in Lucky Plaza, then another one  it's a Bistro and there was an outlet then in Orchard Tower, before the management closure of  Orchard Tower and Lucky Plaza. Now, transferred at GOLDHILL PLAZA 01-01, Newton Road.
We, the regular customers, fully support. Except if there is jealousy happened between customer to customer on entertainment which causes misunderstandings. Nevertheless, "Rendezvous Pub' serves better on entertainment, catering " Local Live Band on Wednesdays and  Filipino Live Band on Saturdays, Billiard's  game table  and customers complimentary finger foods. It's management always friendly and it's management a law government law abiding.

The rendezvous pub & bar with a cozy atmosphere , perfect for a relaxed ☺️ evening with friends, with Pool Table & live music every Wednesday  & Saturday ☺️can get a bit loud, it adds to the lively vibe 😀 overall a great 👍 spot for casual drink  and good conversation 🙌
cozy place, there's a live band every wednesday and thursday..friendly staff.
Fun places to go great night fun people 🥂🍻🍾🤣
